item.title: Những chữ đầu tiên
item.description: Hi! Link to heading This is for Hieu in the future. Very nice working on your first web! I am proud of you, please don’t be skeptical of yourself, even though I bet that you are right now haha. Anyhow, if you feel so, remember that everything is going to be daijoubu.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, I’m Hieu! Years ago, I planned to become an astronaut and play football on the moon. Time passed, plan changed. I am now working on data and policy with a dream of changing something for good. I am a Master’s student in Computer Science and Public Policy at the University of Chicago. Here, I am studying how to build good databases and relevant practices, which will be used for policy analysis and prediction tasks.
